TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SemaphoreSlim extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 代表 的輕量型替代品，限制可同時存取一項資源或資源集區的執行緒數目。

span.span: Represents a lightweight alternative to that limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 號誌有兩種類型： 本機號誌和具名的系統號誌。Semaphores are of two types: local semaphores and named system semaphores. 前者是本機應用程式。The former is local to an app. 後者是在作業系統各處，適用於處理序間的同步處理。The latter is visible throughout the operating system and is suitable for inter-process synchronization. 輕量級替代方案不會使用 Windows 核心號誌的類別。The is a lightweight alternative to the class that doesn't use Windows kernel semaphores. 不同於類別類別不支援具名的系統號誌。Unlike the class, the class doesn't support named system semaphores. 您可以將它當做本機信號。You can use it as a local semaphore only. 類別是建議的號誌，單一應用程式中的同步處理。The class is the recommended semaphore for synchronization within a single app. 輕量型號誌，控制對資源集區的應用程式的本機存取。A lightweight semaphore controls access to a pool of resources that is local to your application. 當您具現化某個號誌時，您可以指定可以同時進入號誌的執行緒最大數目。When you instantiate a semaphore, you can specify the maximum number of threads that can enter the semaphore concurrently. 您也可以指定執行緒可以同時進入號誌的初始的數目。You also specify the initial number of threads that can enter the semaphore concurrently. 這會定義將旗號的計數。This defines the semaphore's count. 計數遞減執行緒進入號誌，每次，且每次遞增執行緒釋放號誌。The count is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented each time a thread releases the semaphore. 若要進入號誌，執行緒會呼叫其中一個或多載。To enter the semaphore, a thread calls one of the or overloads. 若要釋放號誌，它會呼叫其中一個多載。To release the semaphore, it calls one of the overloads. 當計數到達零時，其中的後續呼叫`Wait`方法封鎖，直到其他的執行緒釋放號誌。When the count reaches zero, subsequent calls to one of the `Wait` methods block until other threads release the semaphore. 如果多個執行緒會被封鎖，則無法保證的順序，例如 FIFO 或 LIFO，可控制當執行緒進入號誌。If multiple threads are blocked, there is no guaranteed order, such as FIFO or LIFO, that controls when threads enter the semaphore. 用來保護資源的號誌的程式碼的基本結構是：The basic structure for code that uses a semaphore to protect resources is: ``` ' Enter semaphore by calling one of the Wait or WaitAsync methods. SemaphoreSlim.Wait() ' ' Execute code protected by the semaphore. ' SemaphoreSlim.Release() ``` 所有執行緒都釋放號誌，計數為最大值時指定已建立號誌。When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created. 號誌計數是可從屬性。The semaphore's count is available from the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 類別不會強制要求上呼叫的執行緒或工作識別， ，和方法。The class doesn't enforce thread or task identity on calls to the , , and methods. 此外，如果建構函式用來具現化物件屬性可以增加超過設定的建構函式的值。In addition, if the constructor is used to instantiate the object, the property can increase beyond the value set by the constructor. 程式設計人員必須負責確保要呼叫或方法適當地搭配呼叫方法。It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that calls to or methods are appropriately paired with calls to methods. ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個號誌的三個執行緒的最大計數與初始計數為零的執行緒。The following example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three threads and an initial count of zero threads. 此範例會啟動有五個工作，全部都是封鎖而等待號誌。The example starts five tasks, all of which block waiting for the semaphore. 主執行緒呼叫號誌計數增加至其最大值，允許進入號誌的三個工作的多載。The main thread calls the overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, which allows three tasks to enter the semaphore. 已釋放號誌，每次會顯示先前的號誌計數。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 主控台訊息追蹤號誌的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模擬的工作間隔會稍微增加每個執行緒，可讓輸出更容易閱讀。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread to make the output easier to read. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.semaphoreslim/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.semaphoreslim/vb/example.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公用和受保護成員是安全執行緒，而且可用來同時從多個執行緒，但，必須使用它時，才在所有其他作業已完成。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must be used only when all other operations on the have completed.

summary.span: 指定可同時授與的初始要求數目，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of requests that can be granted concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `initialCount`參數定義輸入可被授與之號誌的並行要求數目。The `initialCount` parameter defines the number of concurrent requests to enter the semaphore that can be granted. 不過，它不會定義可以同時授與的要求數目上限。However, it doesn't define the maximum number of requests that can be granted concurrently. A藉由呼叫這個建構函式具現化的物件不會擲回例外狀況，如果呼叫方法增加的值屬性超出`initialCount`。A object instantiated by calling this constructor doesn't throw a exception if a call to the method increases the value of the property beyond `initialCount`. 會發生這個錯誤有多個呼叫方法比很或方法。This occurs if there are more calls to methods than there are to or methods. 若要設定的輸入可以授與之號誌的並行要求數目上限，請呼叫建構函式。To set the maximum number of concurrent requests to enter the semaphore that can be granted, call the constructor.

exception.span: 小於 0。

span.span: is less than 0.

summary.span: 傳回可用來等候號誌的 。

span.span: Returns a that can be used to wait on the semaphore.
A that can be used to wait on the semaphore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須等候 SemaphoreSlim 連同其他核心為基礎的同步處理的物件與相同的等候控制代碼時，才使用這個屬性。Use this property only when you must wait on a SemaphoreSlim together with other kernel-based synchronization objects with the same wait handle. 成功等候並不表示成功的等候上本身，也不會遞減旗號的計數。A successful wait on the does not imply a successful wait on the itself, nor does it decrement the semaphore's count. 使用等候控制代碼會收到信號之後，您應該等候特別。After the available wait handle is signaled, you should wait on the specifically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值屬性由呼叫設定類別建構函式。The initial value of the property is set by the call to the class constructor. 它也會減少每次呼叫或方法，而且每次呼叫遞增方法。It is decremented by each call to the or method, and incremented by each call to the method.

summary.span: 將 類別目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於大部分的成員，不具備執行緒安全，而且不能與這個執行個體的其他成員同時使用。Unlike most of the members of , is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法遞增一個屬性。A call to the method increments the property by one. 如果值屬性為零，會在呼叫這個方法之前，此方法也可讓一個執行緒或呼叫被封鎖的工作或進入號誌的方法。If the value of the property is zero before this method is called, the method also allows one thread or task blocked by a call to the or method to enter the semaphore.

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, (-1) to wait indefinitely, or zero to test the state of the wait handle and return immediately.

summary.span: 封鎖目前的執行緒，直到這個執行緒可以進入 為止，並使用 32 位元帶正負號的整數來指定逾時。

span.span: Blocks the current thread until it can enter the , using a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the timeout.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行緒成功進入 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current thread successfully entered the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在逾時設定為-1 毫秒，方法將會無限期等候。If the timeout is set to -1 milliseconds, the method waits indefinitely. 如果在逾時設定為零毫秒，此方法不會封鎖。If the timeout is set to zero milliseconds, the method doesn't block. 它會測試的狀態，等候控制代碼，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 如果能夠進入號誌，執行緒或工作它遞減一個屬性。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果呼叫時遭到封鎖的執行緒或工作和所指定的逾時間隔`millisecondsTimeout`到期：If a thread or task is blocked when calling and the timeout interval specified by `millisecondsTimeout` expires: - 執行緒或工作不會進入號誌。The thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore. - 屬性不可遞減。The property isn't decremented.

exception.span: 是除了 -1 以外的負數，表示無限逾時，或是大於 的逾時。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite timeout -or- timeout is greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果能夠進入號誌，執行緒或工作它遞減一個屬性。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果`cancellationToken`已取消，執行緒或工作不會進入號誌，而屬性不可遞減。If `cancellationToken` is cancelled, the thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore, and the property isn't decremented. 相反地，方法會擲回例外狀況。Instead, the method throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在逾時設定為-1 毫秒，方法將會無限期等候。If the timeout is set to -1 milliseconds, the method waits indefinitely. 如果在逾時設定為零毫秒，此方法不會封鎖。If the timeout is set to zero milliseconds, the method doesn't block. 它會測試的狀態，等候控制代碼，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 如果能夠進入號誌，執行緒或工作它遞減一個屬性。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果`cancellationToken`已取消，或如果呼叫時遭到封鎖的執行緒或工作和所指定的逾時間隔`millisecondsTimeout`到期：If `cancellationToken` is cancelled, or if a thread or task is blocked when calling and the timeout interval specified by `millisecondsTimeout` expires: - 執行緒或工作不會進入號誌。The thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore. - 屬性不可遞減。The property isn't decremented. 如果`cancellationToken`已取消，方法會擲回例外狀況。If `cancellationToken` is cancelled, the method throws an exception.

public: bool Wait(TimeSpan timeout, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

param.name: timeout
param.span: ，代表要等候的毫秒數； 為 -1 毫秒表示永遠等候， 為 0 毫秒表示測試等候控制代碼並立即傳回。

span.span: A that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, a that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely, or a that represents 0 milliseconds to test the wait handle and return immediately.
The to observe.

summary.span: 封鎖目前的執行緒，直到這個執行緒可以進入 為止，並使用 來指定逾時，同時觀察 。

span.span: Blocks the current thread until it can enter the , using a that specifies the timeout, while observing a .

returns.span: 如果目前的執行緒成功進入 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current thread successfully entered the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在逾時設定為-1 毫秒，方法將會無限期等候。If the timeout is set to -1 milliseconds, the method waits indefinitely. 如果在逾時設定為零毫秒，此方法不會封鎖。If the timeout is set to zero milliseconds, the method doesn't block. 它會測試的狀態，等候控制代碼，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 如果能夠進入號誌，執行緒或工作它遞減一個屬性。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果`cancellationToken`已取消，或如果呼叫時遭到封鎖的執行緒或工作和所指定的逾時間隔`millisecondsTimeout`到期：If `cancellationToken` is cancelled, or if a thread or task is blocked when calling and the timeout interval specified by `millisecondsTimeout` expires: - 執行緒或工作不會進入號誌。The thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore. - 屬性不可遞減。The property isn't decremented. 如果`cancellationToken`已取消，方法會擲回例外狀況。If `cancellationToken` is cancelled, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 已取消。

span.span: was canceled.

exception.span: 是除了 -1 以外的負數，表示無限逾時，或是大於 的逾時。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite timeout -or- timeout is greater than .

exception.span: semaphoreSlim 執行個體已經處置

span.span: The semaphoreSlim instance has been disposed

exception.span: 已處置建立 的 。

span.span: The that created has already been disposed.

summary.span: 以非同步方式等候進入 。

span.span: Asynchronously waits to enter the .
